fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Go farming. Each time you farm, you can use an additional ability at the same time.
- Sell stuff, increasing either your attack or defense.
- Attack someone.
- Educate the Town, publicly revealing one role in the game.
- Produce energy, granting all Town roles roleblock and control immunity.
- Heal the Town, curing all Town roles of negative effects such as poison and bleeding.
- Defend the Town, granting all Town Basic defense.
- Ensure justice, allowing two people to be hanged the next day.
- Send out laborers to grant all Town roles Astral.
- Improve relations with Neutrals. All roles with the goal "Live to see the Town lose" must now "Survive to the end of the game."
- Improve the land Salem is on, allowing full moons to show everyone who visited them.
- Make money through taxes, improving your Attack and Defense at the cost of roleblocking a Townie.
- Transport two players.
- Permanently grant Town roles who killed an evil Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Unless otherwise specified, your effects only last the night they are used.
- Increases and decreases to Attack and Defense are an exception.
